titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Roland Orvil Baughman Collection about L. Frank Baum

did.unittitle: Roland Orvil Baughman Collection about L. Frank Baum

repository.corpname: Columbia UniversityRare Book and Manuscript Library,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection of material by and about L. Frank Baum is an adjunct to the collection of first editions of Baum's writings made by Roland O. Baughman over a period of many years. An important part of the collection consists of the correspondence and papers related to the exhibition of L. Frank Baum. This exhibition was mounted at the Columbia University Libraries in 1956 to mark the centenary of Baum's birth. Baum manuscripts, original drawings by illustrators of Baum books, and issues of periodicals in which Baum pieces appeared constitute the core of the collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Box 1: Cataloged manuscripts, drawings, etc.; Box 2: Columbia University Libraries Baum Exhibition 1956; Box 3: Periodicals with contributions by and about Baum; Box 4: Photostats of title pages, etc. and ephemera; Box 5: Uncataloged books by and about Baum.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The following boxes are located off-site: 2-5. You will need to request this material from the Rare Book and Manuscript Library at least twenty-four (24) hours in advance to use the collection in the Rare Book and Manuscript Library reading room.

custodhist.p: Gift of Roland O. Baughman and others.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of specific item; Date (if known); Collection Name; Box and Folder (if known); Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University Library.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. The RBML maintains ownership of the physical material only. Copyright remains with the creator and his/her heirs. The responsibility to secure copyright permission rests with the patron.

otherfindaid.p: Finding aid in repository and online.

relatedmaterial.head: Selected Related Material-- at Columbia
relatedmaterial.p: International Wizard of Oz Club Records, Rare Book & Manuscript Library.
